issue.title: [R] Handle --use-LTO override
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13587](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13587). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We added UseLTO: false to the DESCRIPTION, but a user can override this with R CMD INSTALL --use-LTO, so we can't rely on UseLTO always/on CRAN. Handle what happens if we still end up in LTOland
